mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lodging (lodging_num, user_id, certify_img, lodging_name,lodging_concept, language, intro_host,intro_lodging ,cost, people_num,bedroom_num,bed_num,bed_size,bathroom_num,reg_state,create_dt,deleted_yn) values (#{lodgingNum},'테스트아이디',#{certifyImg},#{lodgingName},#{lodgingConcept},#{language},#{introHost},#{introLodging}, #{cost},#{peopleNum},#{bedroomNum},#{bedNum},#{bedSize},#{bathroomNum},'숙소승인전',NOW(),'N')
